id: ”The needs of the kingdom outweigh the needs of the one”

onSuccess.displayText:
”The needs of the kingdom outweigh the needs of the one,“ {Player} said, still resting in his mother’s embrace.

Having been raised as the crown heir had given him the wisdom and knowledge he would need to guide {Kingdom#Name} toward a brighter future. That meant putting the kingdom, and its people, before his own desires.
choices: Continue on the path of an heir
